StratmasClient.map
Class GraticuleLayer

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.map.GraticuleLayer

public class GraticuleLayer
extends Object

The graticules which cover a region inside a bounding box are created. Density of graticules can be set to 10, 5 and 1 degree(s).

          Five degrees spacing between graticules.

Method Detail

drawGraticules

public static void drawGraticules(javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                                  BoundingBox box,
                                  Projection proj,
                                  double spacing)
Computes graticule lines over an area inside the bounding box.

Parameters:
gl - the gl to draw on.
box - bounding box of the actual area.
proj - the projection from lat,lon to XY.
spacing - spacing between graticules.
